Posts.Content: Ali owl Morning.  I had the same using fat from my stomach it took me about 3 months. But everyone is different. I wouldn' rush it as your health is important. It' now March. Im' self employed and have been off work since my Op in August 2017. I finished chemo. Now I'm expected to go to radiotherapy. It' all too much but be strong, except all Help, rest and listen to you plastic surgeon and please do the physio exercise as it will help with mobility.  Be strong xx Afrogirl
Posts.Title: Time frames
